= Introduction =
 * Author: Bast
 * shows helps in a miniwindow
 * expiration can be set to any number of hours

= Installation ==
 * Required 
  * [miniwin] and its dependencies
  * [pluginhelper] and its dependencies
  * [aardb]
  * [aardutils]
 * see the [Download] Page, and copy the file into worlds\plugins\Aardwolf

= Troubleshooting =
 * if you do not see the window, "mnhelp !AardHelp toggle"
